pitRuqNA(gm) sada#namaqsIti# baqrq.hirava# stRuNAti pitRudEvaqtyA$(1q)(gg)q hyE#tad-yanniKA#taqM ~Myad-baqrq.hirana#vastIrya minuqyAt pi#tRudEvaqtyO# niKA#taH syAd baqrq.hira#vaqstIrya# minOtyaqsyAmEqvaina#M minOti yUpaSakaqlamavA$syatiq satE#jasamEqvaina#M minOti dEqvastvA# saviqtA maddhvA#&naqktvityA#haq 
tEja#saiqvaina#manakti supippaqlAByaq-stvauSha#dhIByaq iti# caqShAlaqM prati#- [  ] 20
